name: Distributed Prime Number Generation
short_description:
This algorithm (implemented in C) will use GMP and and the MPI specification in order to generate the longest list of prime numbers in history.

Some ideas for this project include:
Scalable HPC algorithm for clusters of unlimited size.
A branch that runs on home desktop and laptop computers via the Internet donating unused processing power to help generate prime numbers.
Adding MYSQL support so that a copy of all found prime numbers are stored in a database offsite.
summary: A distirbuted algorithm in C for generating Prime Numbers
